name: Symmetry Wars
description:
Symmetry Wars is a 2.5D top down wave shooter! Enjoy 50 waves of non stop blasting.  It is currently in the Alpha stages, so there will be lots more to come. Currently there are 3 classes each with different attributes. As well as 2 gun classes side arm and rifles, with a third gun class coming soon!

Questions? Contact LateNightTyping at twitter @LateTyping. Or email : latenighttyping@gmail.com
